mapper.select: SELECT a.arrivalSeq ,a.arrivalAccount ,a.arrivalRegDate ,a.arrivalModDate ,a.arrivalDelNy ,b.productName ,b.productCode ,b.productPrice ,b.productTypeCd ,c.companyName FROM arrival a LEFT JOIN product b on a.productSeqF = b.productSeq LEFT JOIN company c on c.companySeq = b.companySeqF

SELECT a.arrivalSeq ,a.arrivalAccount ,a.arrivalRegDate ,a.arrivalModDate ,a.arrivalDelNy ,b.productName ,b.productCode ,b.productPrice ,b.productTypeCd ,c.companyName FROM arrival a LEFT JOIN product b on a.productSeqF = b.productSeq LEFT JOIN company c on c.companySeq = b.companySeqF WHERE a.arrivalSeq = #{arrivalSeq}
